meanings.definition: The facial features or expression of a person, especially when regarded as indicative of character or ethnic origin.
meanings.sent1: Her physiognomy revealed a kind and gentle soul.
meanings.sent2: I could tell from his physiognomy that he was feeling sad.
meanings.sent3: His physiognomy lit up with joy when he saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The physiognomy of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The physiognomy of the mountain range was breathtaking against the sunset.

meanings.definition: The general form or appearance of something.
meanings.sent1: The physiognomy of the building was imposing and grand.
meanings.sent2: The physiognomy of the landscape changed dramatically after the storm.
meanings.sent3: The cake's physiognomy was so perfect that it looked too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: The physiognomy of the city transformed under the glow of the fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The physiognomy of the flower garden was a riot of colors in full bloom.
